title: Microsoft Publisher 2002 (With Serial)
description:
Microsoft Publisher 2002


Installation Instructions:
			

	To Install, just click on the file named "PUB", this will then
	ask if you would like to install Microsoft Publisher 2003 and
	where to. Just copy and paste the provided Serial Key to
	activate this product.


REMEMBER!

Seed and Enjoy! Seldom let big corporations steal your money ;)


EDIT: Right....seeing how some of you a total n00bs and dont know what the hell your doing...ill talk you through the n00b approach.

Step One. Download this torrent and wait for it to reach 100%.
Now inside the download folder will be a folder which is labelled Microsoft Publisher 2003 (With Serial). I Know this is 2002, it was a typo when i made the torrent. Now open that folder. There should be 8 objects. I mean it's gonna be SO hard to find the 2 files you need to use most...
Step Two. Open the .msi called PUB. This should start the installation.
Step Three. When asked enter the serial key, or paste it. Incidentally if you cant find the serial...look for a notepad .txt file called...Serial Key. 

NOTES:

This does a complete install!!!
If it doesn't work then its because of user error. 


ps. Im sorry if i came off as rude right there, but after taking the time to create and seed this torrent, a little appreciation would be nice, instead of rude and n00bish comments, i mean come on you got this for free anyway. 

Enjoy.
